thread.title: Cops seek help in locating puppy stolen from Bronx apartment
thread.title_full: Cops seek help in locating puppy stolen from Bronx apartment - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Cops seek help in locating puppy stolen from Bronx apartment
text:
Luna the female Siberian Husky puppy was stolen from an apartment near Underhill and Lacombe Aves. in Castle Hill late Tuesday, cops said. Cops are asking for the public's help finding thugs who stole a puppy along with cash, electronics and sneakers from a Bronx apartment.
The victim, who is in his 30s, returned to his apartment near Underhill and Lacombe Aves. in Castle Hill at about 12 p.m. Tuesday, cops said, when he discovered his front door lock broken.
Inside, the victim noticed his female Siberian Husky puppy named "Luna" missing and his apartment a mess, police said.
Also swiped from the man's apartment were several pairs of Air Jordan sneakers, a Sony PlayStation 4 and $1,000 in cash, cops said. The dog is described as white wearing a pink collar, which says "Luna" on it in a heart, cops said.
Anyone with information is asked to call Crime Stoppers at (800) 577-TIPS.
Related Stories Texas FedEx driver caught on video stealing puppies
